segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t even see the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so bold, taking those cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so high, I’m amazed he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, her hand out like she’s expecting a gift.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be shocked when she finally looks around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it’s making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why no one is stopping this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a disaster movie in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR
